title: Veterans Day, 2025
summary: Proclamation 10991 of November 10, 2025, declares November 11, 2025, as Veterans Day. The proclamation emphasizes the courage, honor, and sacrifice of American veterans, acknowledging their role in securing freedom and liberty. It highlights past failures in providing adequate benefits and healthcare for veterans, vowing to rectify these issues. The proclamation details the current administration's achievements, including reforms to the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA), expansion of healthcare choices, increased accountability, and a significant reduction in the backlog of veterans awaiting benefits. It also mentions the establishment of the National Center for Warrior Independence to address veteran homelessness and tax relief measures for veterans on fixed incomes. The document calls for national reflection and participation in patriotic activities to honor veterans and reaffirms a commitment to supporting them and keeping America strong, proud, and free.
